overview.role_description: Encore is a Fusion main DPS. She deals high burst and off-field DMG through Basic Attack and Resonance Liberation DMG. Versatile in both melee and ranged combat.
overview.synopsis:
Core Mechanics: [Mayhem]. When [Mayhem] is full, using a Heavy Attack consumes all [Mayhem] and triggers a Mayhem state. While in this state, Encore takes 70% less DMG, and switching characters won’t cancel the effect. When it ends, she deals Fusion DMG.
While under Resonance Liberation, if Encore fills the [Mayhem] again, a Heavy Attack will trigger Cosmos' Mayhem state. This state also reduces DMG taken by 70% and persists through character switches. When it ends, she unleashes Cosmos Rupture for Fusion DMG.
[Mayhem] Gain: Hitting enemies with Normal Attack, Resonance Skill, or Intro Skill restores [Mayhem]. Under Resonance Liberation, all hits restore [Mayhem].
Rotation: E1→E2→R→AAAA*n→H.
overview.rotation:
Team Comp Analysis: Prioritize teammates who boost Fusion DMG, Basic Attack DMG, or Resonance Liberation DMG. Since Encore has multiple off-field tools, she works well in coordinated rotations.
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.

texts.name: Stringmaster
texts.effectDescription: Grants (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%) Attribute DMG Bonus. When dealing Resonance Skill DMG, increases ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) times. This effect lasts for (5/5/5/5/5)s. When the wielder is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%).

texts.name: Cosmic Ripples
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). When dealing Basic Attack DMG, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by (3.2%/4%/4.8%/5.6%/6.4%), stacking up to (5/5/5/5/5) time(s). This effect lasts for (8/8/8/8/8)s and can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5)s.

texts.name: Augment
texts.effectDescription: Casting Resonance Liberation increases the wielder's ATK by (15%/23.25%/31.5%/39.75%/48%), lasting for (15/15/15/15/15)s.

texts.name: Nightmare: Inferno Rider
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Nightmare: Inferno Rider and jump to attack enemies in front, dealing 405.00% Fusion DMG.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Fusion DMG Bonus and 12.00% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus.

Hold Echo Skill to transform into Nightmare: Inferno Rider and enter Riding Mode. When exiting Riding Mode, deal 283.50% Fusion DMG to enemies in front.

CD: 25s.

texts.name: Molten Rift
texts.description: Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.

texts.name: Molten Rift
texts.description: Fusion DMG + 10%.

texts.name: Inferno Rider
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into the Inferno Rider to launch up to 3 consecutive slashes in a row, each slash dealing 242.40%, 282.80%, and 282.80% Fusion DMG respectively.



After the final hit, increase the current Resonator's Fusion DMG by 12.00% and Basic Attack DMG by 12.00% for 15s.



Long press the Echo Skill to transform into the Inferno Rider and enter Riding Mode. When exiting Riding Mode, deal 282.80% Fusion DMG to enemies in front.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Molten Rift
texts.description: Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.

texts.name: Molten Rift
texts.description: Fusion DMG + 10%.

texts.name: Blazing Brilliance
texts.effectDescription: ATK increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). The wielder gains 1 stack of Searing Feather upon dealing damage, which can be triggered once every 0.5s, and gains 5 stacks of the same effect upon casting Resonance Skill. Each stack of Searing Feather gives (4%/5%/6%/7%/8%) additional Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for up to 14 stacks. After reaching the max stacks, all stacks will be removed in (12/12/12/12/12)s.

texts.name: Nightmare: Inferno Rider
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Nightmare: Inferno Rider and jump to attack enemies in front, dealing 405.00% Fusion DMG.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Fusion DMG Bonus and 12.00% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus.

Hold Echo Skill to transform into Nightmare: Inferno Rider and enter Riding Mode. When exiting Riding Mode, deal 283.50% Fusion DMG to enemies in front.

CD: 25s.

texts.name: Molten Rift
texts.description: Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Angry Cosmos
texts.description: During the Resonance Liberation Cosmos Rave, when Encore's HP is above 70%, DMG dealt is increased by 10%.

texts.name: Woolies Cheer Dance
texts.description: When Resonance Skill Flaming Woolies or Resonance Skill Cosmos - Rampage is cast, Encore's Fusion DMG Bonus is increased by 10% for 10s.

texts.name: Thermal Field
texts.description: Encore generates a Thermal Field centered around skill target, with a radius of 3m. Targets inside the Thermal Field are continuously burned, suffering Fusion DMG equal to 176.76% of Encore's ATK every 1.5s for 6s.

texts.name: Wooly Attack
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Encore performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Fusion DMG.



Basic Attack: Wooly Strike

After Basic Attack 4, press the Normal Attack button to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.



Heavy Attack

Encore consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Encore consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Fusion DMG.



Dodge Counter

Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

texts.name: Flaming Woolies
texts.description:
Flaming Woolies



Encore summons Cloudy and Cosmos to attack with burning rays, dealing Fusion DMG.







Energetic Welcome



After casting Flaming Woolies, use Resonance Skill to perform Energetic Welcome, dealing Fusion DMG.

texts.name: Black & White Woolies
texts.description:
Heavy Attack: Cloudy Frenzy

When Encore's "Mayhem" is full, after casting a Heavy Attack, Encore will consume all "Mayhem" to enter the Mayhem state, reducing damage taken by 70%. Switching Characters does not interrupt the Mayhem state.

After the Mayhem state ends, Encore will cast Cloudy Frenzy, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation damage.



Heavy Attack: Cosmos Rupture

During Cosmos Rave, when casting Heavy Attack, if "Mayhem" is full, Encore will consume all "Mayhem" to enter Cosmos' Mayhem state, reducing damage taken by 70%. Switching Characters does not interrupt the Cosmos' Mayhem state.

After Cosmos' Mayhem state ends, Encore will cast Cosmos Rupture, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG. 

Mayhem

Encore can hold up to 100 "Mayhem".

When Normal Attack Wooly Attack hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".

When Resonance Skill Flaming Woolies hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".

When Resonance Skill Energetic Welcome hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".

When Intro Skill Woolies Helpers hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".

During the duration of Resonance Liberation Cosmos Rave, Encore restores "Mayhem" when hitting a target.

texts.name: Cosmos Rave
texts.description:
As Encore loses control, Cosmos breaks free and wreaks havoc on its surroundings.



Basic Attack: Cosmos - Frolicking

During Cosmos Rave, the Basic Attack is replaced with Cosmos - Frolicking, which performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.



Cosmos: Heavy Attack

During Cosmos Rave, the Heavy Attack is replaced with Cosmos - Heavy Attack, consuming STA to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.



Resonance Skill: Cosmos - Rampage

During Cosmos Rave, Flaming Woolies is replaced with Cosmos - Rampage, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.



Cosmos: Dodge Counter

During Cosmos Rave, use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.

texts.name: Woolies Helpers
texts.description: Encore pounces at the enemies with Cosmos, dealing Fusion DMG.

texts.name: Cosmos Rave
texts.description:
As Encore loses control, Cosmos breaks free and wreaks havoc on its surroundings.



Basic Attack: Cosmos - Frolicking

During Cosmos Rave, the Basic Attack is replaced with Cosmos - Frolicking, which performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.



Cosmos: Heavy Attack

During Cosmos Rave, the Heavy Attack is replaced with Cosmos - Heavy Attack, consuming STA to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.



Resonance Skill: Cosmos - Rampage

During Cosmos Rave, Flaming Woolies is replaced with Cosmos - Rampage, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.



Cosmos: Dodge Counter

During Cosmos Rave, use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.

texts.name: Woolies Helpers
texts.description: Encore pounces at the enemies with Cosmos, dealing Fusion DMG.

texts.name: Wooly's Fairy Tale
texts.description: When Basic Attack hits a target, Encore's Fusion DMG Bonus is increased by 3%, stacking up to 4 time(s) for 6s.

texts.name: Sheep-counting Lullaby
texts.description: Encore additionally restores 10 Resonance Energy when casting Basic Attack Wooly Strike or Resonance Skill Energetic Welcome. This can be triggered once every 10s.

texts.name: Fog? The Black Shores!
texts.description: The DMG multiplier of Heavy Attack Cloudy Frenzy and Heavy Attack Cosmos Rupture is increased by 40%.

texts.name: Adventure? Let's go!
texts.description: Heavy Attack Cosmos Rupture increases the Fusion DMG Bonus of all team members by 20% for 30s.

texts.name: Hero Takes the Stage!
texts.description: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by 35%.

texts.name: Woolies Save the World!
texts.description: During Resonance Liberation Cosmos Rave, Encore gains 1 stack(s) of "Lost Lamb" every time she deals damage, each stack increasing her ATK by 5% for 10s, stacking up to 5 time(s).
